AutoSearchYamlTemplatesContent.description: 自动化搜索作业yaml目标内容。

name: ShowAutoSearchYamlTemplateContent

projectIDParam.description: 用户项目ID。获取方法请参见[获取项目ID和名称](modelarts_03_0147.xml)。
projectIDParam.name: project_id

get.description: 获取自动化搜索作业yaml模板的内容。

application/json.content:
general:
  instance_per_trial: 1
  gpu_per_instance: 1
  cpu_per_instance: 1

search_space:
  - params:   # only support continuous params
    - type: continuous_param
      name : lr
      start: 0.001
      stop: 0.1

search_algorithm:
  type: bayes_opt_search
  max_concurrent: 4
  reward_attr: accuracy
  num_samples: 8
  kind : ucb
  save_model_count : 3
  mode: max

scheduler:
  type: FIFOScheduler

get.summary: 获取自动化搜索作业yaml模板的内容
get.x-request-examples-description-1: 如下查询algorithm_type为hpo且algorithm_name为Bayes的yaml配置文件内容。

summary: 获取自动化搜索作业yaml模板的内容
